name: Kingdom of Blades（Oculus Quest VR）
description:
Kingdom of Blades（Oculus Quest VR）

Experience the best in VR swordplay and live out the events of the Three Kingdoms！Play as a front-line warrior in the Three Kingdoms Period of China, you must slash your way through hordes of enemies and face off against the most famous generals. Engaging Campaign Play through the chapters of the campaign and be greeted by familiar historical settings with witty dialogue. Expansive Weapon System Choose from a selection of iconic weapons found throughout history, there’s a blade for every occasion. Cinematic Selfies Once a level is complete simply turn around, strike a pose, put on your best picture face and slice the camera to take the most epic selfie of all time! Beat the high scores Challenge in endless mode, and leave your name in the leaderboard!

Making The Most Of Quest

The game perfectly supports Quest devices, providing a very refreshing 6dof cutting experience. It is worth mentioning that the experience of holding weapons with Quest handles is great.
